snippet.title: Five Nights at Candy's Remastered (Official) Teaser
snippet.description:
This is Five Nights at Candy's Remastered, a game remade for the 4th anniversary of the Five Nights at Candy's game (and series). The most notable difference between this remaster and the original game, is that the graphics have been upgraded to a whole new level. Technical nerds among you will love to know that all the game's 3D renders have been re-rendered in Blender Cycles. With this, models have been polished, and all materials/textures having received an upgrade as well.

Help me get 5,000,000 Subscribers! ► http://bit.ly/IULITM
My brother► http://bit.ly/maryogames
Baldi ► https://www.youtube.com/balditm

GAME: https://gamejolt.com/games/five-nights-at-candy-s-remastered/426659

God bless you!
